article: an eastern faction of the tamil tiger rebels that broke with the main group this week in the movement 's first major rift says it is seeking a separate truce with the government , a move that international mediators say could complicate peace efforts .
abstract: breakaway rebel group seeks separate truce pact with sri lankan government
